#!/bin/bash

DIR="android/app/build/intermediates/flutter/{variant}/flutter_assets/android"
if [ -d "$DIR" ]; then
rm -rf "$DIR"
fi
DIR="android/app/build/intermediates/merged_assets/{variant}/out/flutter_assets/android"
if [ -d "$DIR" ]; then
rm -rf "$DIR"
fi
